  • Method Details

    • initDB

      public static void initDB() throws SQLException, IOException
      Creates new database if it doesn't exist Reads instructions from the init-ddl.sql resource file and then executes them
      Throws:
      SQLException - if commands execution fails
      IOException - if commands reading fails

    • dropDB

      public static void dropDB() throws SQLException
      Deletes existing database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if commands execution fails

    • getUserID

      public static int getUserID​(String username) throws SQLException
      Finds a user that has a specified username If there isn't a user having this username, new ID is created
      Parameters:
      username - username
      Returns:
      user ID
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database reading fails

    • loadDataFromDatabase

      public static List<Result> loadDataFromDatabase​(int userid) throws SQLException
      Retrieves checking results from the database
      Parameters:
      userid - ID of user whose results we need
      Returns:
      list of results
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database reading fails

    • readFile

      public static String readFile​(String filename) throws IOException
      Reads all characters from a file
      Parameters:
      filename - full relative or absolute path to the file
      Returns:
      file contents
      Throws:
      IOException - if file reading fails

    • saveResult

      public static void saveResult​(int userid, double x, double y, double r, boolean included) throws SQLException
      Saving checking result to the database
      Parameters:
      userid - ID of user who checked the point
      x - point coordinate X
      y - point coordinate Y
      r - area parameter R
      included - is the point included in the area or not
      Throws:
      SQLException - if result saving fails

    • deleteData

      public static void deleteData​(int userid) throws SQLException
      Removes data of checks made by specified user Does NOT remove a user
      Parameters:
      userid - ID of user whose data we want to delete
      Throws:
      SQLException - if data deletion fails
